column4: I'm using Ubuntu 6.06, when I use copy or cut, I can paste until I close the program I took it from. Once I close that program I can't paste, how can I change that?
that's the way linux apps seem to work
is there anything I can do?
not that I am aware of other than keeping the app open untill you have pasted, not really researched it but have heard comments about this elsewhere
